core_values.title: Freshness First
core_values.description: We prioritize fresh, locally-sourced ingredients to ensure every dish is wholesome and packed with natural flavors.

core_values.title: Homestyle Cooking
core_values.description: Our meals are prepared just like they are at home â€” with love, tradition, and care, ensuring comfort in every bite.

core_values.title: Hygiene & Safety
core_values.description: We maintain the highest standards of cleanliness in our kitchen, ensuring your food is prepared in a safe and sanitary environment.

core_values.title: Customer Satisfaction
core_values.description: Your happiness is our priority. We listen to your feedback and go the extra mile to make sure every meal brings a smile.

core_values.title: Authenticity
core_values.description: Each recipe is crafted to retain its original flavor and cultural roots, bringing you the true taste of home.

core_values.title: Affordability
core_values.description: Delicious, home-cooked meals should be accessible to everyone. We keep our prices fair without compromising quality.

core_values.title: Sustainability
core_values.description: We care for the planet by minimizing food waste, using eco-friendly packaging, and supporting sustainable practices.
